amendment.description: Amendment directs the GAO to conduct a study to determine the effects the enactment of H.R. 3915 will have on the availability and affordability of credit for homebuyers and mortgage lending, and to submit a report to Congress containing the findings and conclusions within one year of the enactment of the legislation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 110-450 to direct the GAO to conduct a study to determine the effects the enactment of H.R. 3915 will have on the availability and affordability of credit for homebuyers and mortgage lending, and to submit a report to Congress containing the findings and conclusions within one year of the enactment of the legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Putnam amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
